message:
SYSTEM: 2023.10.OEG.pdf: Página 7
What have I been up to?
Some comments on the conference
* Isam and Carlos Badenes also came! (nice group-building )
ABOUT THE CONFERENCE

“Group of Friends” vibes.

Very very low level of papers! Workshop papers >>> Conference papers.

Next year it will be JCR Q4! Perfect place to send minor papers and get a journal.

PhD Students presenting on the symposium have free trip!

Interesting source of proposals/collaborations/stays.
OEG SELF PROMOTION

People went like armies, a lot from the same lab! It is important to “be there”.

Poster presentation of projects (great dissemination oportunity)

Not only NLP… people interested in ontologies!

Self-promotion strategy from Hitz, we should learn!

People with t-shirts from their lab… we need pins or something!
OUTCOMES

Contacts from several NLP companies.

Dissinformation group.

Next year we should go ALL TOGETHER (Valladolid, close!)
7
speaker: SYSTEM
